title: Find out what Netflix knows about you!
section1.title: While you stream on Netflix, Netflix basically streams a part of your privacy.
section1.description: With the Netflix Data Importer, you can load a copy of your data into your polyPod in just a few steps â€“ easily, quickly and securely. This way, you can find out what data Netflix has actually stored about you and for what purpose.
section2.title: Netflix and chill your data.
section2.description:
As the world's largest streaming provider in its industry, Netflix is thus also one of the big data oligarchs of our time. 

However, you should not only have control over your media library, but also over your data. The first step is to download a copy of your data from Netflix into your polyPod to find out what Netflix actually knows about you.
In the future, you will then have the option to delete your data from Netflix and decide for yourself what data you make available. Thus, you not only regain control over your data, but also weaken the monopoly position of such companies, as they now no longer have sole control over it.
